hero_heading: Dikat Al Waqt provides reliable transportation services within the Kingdom.
hero_description: With over 20 years of experience in transporting individuals and groups within and between Saudi cities, we offer exceptional service for pilgrims and visitors, supported by a modern fleet operating around the clock.

our_mission.title: Our Mission
our_mission.description: Providing safe and reliable transportation services within the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, with a modern fleet and 24-hour availability, with special care for the comfort of pilgrims and visitors in Makkah, Madinah, and Jeddah.
